programme.title: Binibining Marikit
programme.desc: This is the story of Marikit, or Ikit, a hardworking and cheerful Dumagat Remontado tour guide. Raised by her father Gani after being abandoned by her mother Mayumi, Ikit grows up believing that her mother left them for ambition. Their lives take a turn when Rica, a widow, and her daughter Angela arrive in Daraitan, scheming to buy Dumagat lands for a development project.

programme.title: Mga Batang Riles
programme.desc: It tells the story of four underprivileged boys -- Kidlat, Kulot, Sig, and Dags -- who were detained in a juvenile center as a punishment for a crime they did not commit. programme.title: It's Showtime
programme.desc: 'It's Showtime' is a hit variety program that thrives on spontaneity and animated conversations.

programme.title: Tatlong Anak, Isang Ama
programme.desc: Set in the city of Olongapo during the last days of the US bases in the Philippines, this is a tale about the life of a musician and his three sons by three different women.

programme.title: Ikaw Ang Miss Universe ng Buhay Ko
programme.desc: Andrew E and his gang rescued the damsels in distress from a robbery accident. He gave them food and lodging in his humble home, hopeful that someday, Charlene, one of the girls he rescued, would learn to love him.

programme.title: Sagad Hanggang Buto
programme.desc: When his parents are killed by assassins in the family car, Banjo is adopted by the thief who took his dead parents' wallet. Raised in poverty and used to surviving with his wits, he grows up as the town's resident hoodlum.

programme.title: Rocky N Rolly
programme.desc: The swindling trio of Rolly, Alex and Cleto earn big bucks by using different disguises to fool people. They soon join forces with ex-boxer, Rocky, who quit the sport after syndicate hench men beat him up for refusing him to join the game.

programme.title: Uubusin Ko Ang Lahi Mo
programme.desc: The canonigos led by Mayor Placido (Eddie Gutierrez) have enjoyed sole political control of the town for sometime now. But their abusive reign is threatened when Fortunato Guerrero (Robert Arevalo) plans to enter the political arena in the coming elections. The Guerrero and Canonigo clans both vow to eliminate the each other.

programme.title: Muling Buksan ang Puso (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Too much love suffocates and covetousness can breed hate.

programme.title: Working Girls (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: A humorous, but truly insightful look into the lives of women trying to make a living in the big city and coping with all the prejudice life bestowed on them because of their sex. This is also about their loves, their dreams, their weaknesses.

programme.title: Kaliwa't Kanan, Sakit ng Katawan
programme.desc: Ruben and Lorena are still on their honeymoon stage, but she has already decided to take on family planning the natural way. Disappointed and desperate, he gets into an illicit relationship.

programme.title: Ultimatum
programme.desc: Dina played a Filipina working with a US-based chemical company. Eddie played the Chief of Police assigned to protect the chemical company visiting group which fell victim to a terrorist gang. Eddie was only too obsessed to save the company because Dina happened to be his girlfriend.

programme.title: Wala Na Bang Pag-ibig?
programme.desc: For years, they have been the best of friends. Gemma is bratty Eric’s buddy, and to some extent, accomplice in his not too few escapades. But what if one day, all of a sudden, Gemma feels something different for Eric?

programme.title: Saan Nagtatago Ang Pag-ibig? (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: A marriage of convenience became a fulfilling relationship that eventually opened the eyes and hearts of everybody into the beautiful soul hidden inside the young man nobody wanted. Starring Vilma Santos, Tonton Gutierrez and Ricky Davao.

programme.title: Miss Na Miss Kita (Ang Utol Kong Hoodlum 2)
programme.desc: Together, Robin and Vina, created beautiful music. Together they were in constant danger because of certain people and certain events, which were taking place around them, but they were not aware of.

programme.title: Silang Matatapang (Walang Atras Sa Laban)
programme.desc: Raymond Bagatsing is set to plunge headstrong into this action picture. His voluptuous real life girlfriend, Shirley Fuentes, is part of the cast in this slambang action movie.

programme.title: Abrakadabra
programme.desc: Dolphy is a poor man who finds a jar which turns out to be the home of a genie (Jimmy Santos).

programme.title: Parañaque Bank Robbery
programme.desc: There was a robbery in the bank where Joselito Joseco was employed and having adapted the guts and bravery of his idol, he was able to save the loot and shoot down the robbers.

programme.title: Buy One, Take One
programme.desc: Salve (Sharon) and Sion (Susan) are sisters living with their grandparents. One day, Salve's friend invites her to apply for abroad only to be tricked because it was an illegal recruitment agency selling women for foreigners.

programme.title: Anabelle Huggins Story, Ruben Ablaza Tragedy
programme.desc: The abduction and rape of pretty Annabelle Huggins was one of the most sensational crimes of the 60's. The movie bit player was kidnapped by jeepney driver, Ruben Ablaza, whom many believed was obssesed with her.

programme.title: Anak ng Lupa
programme.desc: Hector learns about his parents' tragic past including his father's death at the hands of a traitor. He succeeds in killing Nestong Antok but his son, Ariosto vows to avenge his father's death. Will this vicious cycle of revenge ever end?

programme.title: Si Maryo O Si Goko
programme.desc: Loony William Martinez stars as your COMPU-WHACKO THRILL-SEEKER who entered into a series of hell-raising misadventures that will take the viewers to the outskirts of computer-generated fantasia.

programme.title: TGIS, The Movie
programme.desc: The top-rating TV show about teen-age life came to the screen in this adventure film where the TGIS kids learned the value of friendship.

programme.title: Misis Mo, Misis Ko
programme.desc: Two married couples, Dina and Edu and Jackie and Ricky, became close friends. The amorous merry-go-round came full circle when hurt at what she and he thought was betrayal.

programme.title: Biktima
programme.desc: The first time their paths crossed, they are virtual enemies – Becca (Sharon Cuneta) is the relentless prosecutor while Jing (Christopher de Leon) is the jittery accused.

programme.title: Kamagong (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Arnis, the ancient Filipino martial art, took center stage in this coming of age drama wherein a young boy perfected his skills and his idol rediscovered what it takes to be a man.

programme.title: Masamang Damo
programme.desc: When Joko Diaz placed his family in danger after getting into an imbroglio with fellow slumboys, he wisely contrived a plan.
